Judul: ECONOMICAL FEASIBILITY ANALYSIS OF EMBROIDERY WORKING STATION IN PT. X
Abstrak: The objective of this project is to analyze the economical feasibility of embroidery working station in the company. In order to determine whether the embroidery working station is economic feasible or not, Present Worth (PW) method and the Internal Rate of Return (IRR), and Discounted Payback Period (PP) method will be used as the theoretical foundation. To support the economical feasibility analysis, this project will also consist of sensitivity analysis. It measures the sensitivity level of PW and IRR of embroidery working station to the changes of particular factors or variables such as changing of direct material or labor cost, quantity demand, and selling price.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Ir. Drs. H. Arson Aliludin, SE, DEA.
Kata Kunci: economical feasibility analysis, Present Worth, IRR, PP, sensitivity analysis
